name: Dream Meta Gallery
description:
Description: 

"The protagonist walk into meta gallery. Suddenly he falls asleep during the tour and wakes up inside the dream. He will have to see familiar spaces from a different point of view, go beyond the gallery and move into the metaverse. The unusual world is not friendly and logical, the protagonist cannot move or interact with the environment. Deprivation. Cruel fate and the law of meanness. Maybe it's not worth it? It's up to you, my dear lover of art and crypto art. Discover the secrets of Dream Meta Gallery!" 

- NanoDeveloper#2

Gameplay:

One person is wearing glasses, the other 1 or 2 people use only joysticks and prompts of a person in VR glasses.  Since the player cannot use the controllers and interact with the virtual stage, a joint cross-platform experience is created between the players through communication. A player with a VR helmet cannot interact and is limited by insufficient stage lighting.  Other players with controllers can use a flashlight to illuminate areas of the level and help with navigation, as well as interact with the environment.

Control:

Player with VR Headset:

◆Rotation of head.

Player with Touch Controller:

◆HandTrigger - Grab

◆IndexTrigger - Action with grabbed item

Critical bugs: 

- Separation system doesn't work properly. controllers still available on distance of player with  vr headset.

- Flashlight is unavailable at current build.

- Menu and settings are unavailable.

- Guardian is unavailable at current build.

Known issues:

- Need space for walking at least 2*2 meters. Another way some parts of the level can't be reach.
